Tag.description: Tag is a key-value pair associated with accelerator.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: Key of the tag. Value can be 1 to 127 characters.

type.description: Key of the tag. Value can be 1 to 127 characters.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Value for the tag. Value can be 1 to 255 characters.

type.description: Value for the tag. Value can be 1 to 255 characters.

properties.name: Enabled
properties.description: Indicates whether an accelerator is enabled. The value is true or false.

type.description: Indicates whether an accelerator is enabled. The value is true or false.

properties.name: IpAddresses
properties.description: The IP addresses from BYOIP Prefix pool.

type.description: The IP addresses from BYOIP Prefix pool.

properties.name: AcceleratorArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the accelerator.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the accelerator.

properties.name: DnsName
properties.description: The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to your accelerator's static IPv4 addresses.

type.description: The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to your accelerator's static IPv4 addresses.

properties.name: DualStackDnsName
properties.description: The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to your accelerator's static IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.

type.description: The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to your accelerator's static IPv4 and IPv6 addresses.

properties.name: Ipv4Addresses
properties.description: The IPv4 addresses assigned to the accelerator.

type.description: The IPv4 addresses assigned to the accelerator.

properties.name: Ipv6Addresses
properties.description: The IPv6 addresses assigned if the accelerator is dualstack

type.description: The IPv6 addresses assigned if the accelerator is dualstack
